nodes.text: The WESTAR-35 blaster pistol was a model of blaster pistol from the WESTAR series of blasters. Capable of firing yellow or blue bolts of plasma, the WESTAR-35 was the favored weapon of numerous Mandalorians.

The WESTAR-35 blaster pistol was used around and during the time of the pan-galactic Clone Wars by several members of the Mandalorian culture. Pre Vizsla wielded twin WESTAR-35 pistols as his weapons of choice, and the blaster saw extensive use among the Death Watch soldiers Vizsla commanded at their base on Mandalore's moon, Concordia. Officers of the Mandalorian police force in the New Mandalorian capital city of Sundari also utilized the weapon.

As a product of the WESTAR series of blasters, the WESTAR-35 was the successor to the WESTAR-20 and WESTAR-34 blaster pistols. The WESTAR-35 was also capable of firing both yellow or blue-colored bolts of plasma.
